channel.title: [Delta] Client null disconnection
channel.description:
Okay, so I have been coding a new server the last couple of days(Acrylicx). I got to the point where I was ready to let a couple friends come and test so I could hammer the last of the bugs out.. Problem is no one could connect to my server, when they tried it said something along the line "client null disconnected" and their IP address. I was able to connect through localhost, but not my through my no-ip. Yes, I have successfully port forwarded. And yes, the port, and IP match up in GUI.java client-sided, and yes I have compiled. I suspect my error is either in client.java or server.java under the "run()" method. I suspect it may be a form of antileach even though the post said no antileach, but opinions and help would be much appreciated, I hope I can be running online soon.
Thanks,
-Death Wish

item.title: [Delta] Client null disconnection
item.dc:creator: @death_wish1234 death wish1234
